abstract: Instead of landing in the theaters, the film, called "Unauthorized: The Harvey Weinstein Project,'' will be shown on IFC's Sundancenow.com's streaming service.
snippet: Instead of landing in the theaters, the film, called "Unauthorized: The Harvey Weinstein Project,'' will be shown on IFC's Sundancenow.com's streaming service.

headline.main: Online, a Documentary About Harvey Weinstein
